name: JewishPrayers
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jewish prayers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sit back, relax and have Alexa be your guide to jewish prayers. You can ask for a prayer based on the list in the description below, or you can ask it to pick a prayer for you.

Listen to all the prayers in two more voices: Rabbi Frank, a human male voice, and Rabbanit Jen, a human female voice, from the Premium Subscription.

List of Prayers:

Morning Prayer
Shema
Hanukkah Candle Lighting Prayer
Prayer for Passover
Before Surgery
For Healing
Prayer Before Drinking Wine
Prayer Before a Meal
Blessing Over Fruit
On Lighting Shabbat Candles
Rosh Hashanah Prayer
The Al Chet YomKippur Confession
Blessing for Sukkot
On the First Night Only
Night Prayer
Vidui Confession Before Death
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
